Enum Summary
AnimationEasing The easing function applied to an animation
AxisTitlesPosition Where to place the axis titles, compared to the chart area.
BarFormatColor A list of valid colors for BarFormat
CurveType Controls the curve of the lines when the line width is not zero.
Direction The direction in which the values along the axis grow.
DisplayMode Defines types of maps for GeoChart.
FocusTarget The type of the entity that receives focus on mouse hover.
FormatType A quick formatting option for the date.
LegendPosition Where to place the chart title, compared to the chart area.
MatchType Whether the control should match exact values only, prefixes starting from the beginning of the value or any substring.
Orientation The slider orientation.
PieSliceText The content of the text displayed on the slice.
Resolution Defines the resolution of the map borders.
SelectedValuesLayout How to display selected values, when multiple selection is allowed.
SeriesType The type of marker for a series.
TableSort If and how to sort columns when the user clicks a column heading.
TitlePosition Where to place the chart title, compared to the chart area.
TooltipText What information to display when the user hovers over a pie slice.
TooltipTrigger The user interaction that causes the tooltip to be displayed.
